price: A koliko smo Mi prije njih naroda uništili koji su blagom i izgledom divljenje izazivali!
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum aḥsanu athāthan wari'yan
